title: Connie Pendrive and the Infinity Well
description: Connie Pendrive's life is her job at Dodds and Horsefield Insurance and her dog, Crumpet. That's until she uncovers a mystical fountain of youth in her garden.With her Mum being lost to dementia and her sister Angelica's cynical motives to put Mother in a home to get her hands on the family house, Connie forms a plan to stop her.Can Connie save her Mother from the beige existence of the Swansong retirement home? Will she win the attentions of Adam, the new guy at work before the seductive Jemima gets her false nails into him? And just what is that divot in the lawn that keeps growing larger?
author: Marc Paterson
